nodes.text: An ancient Sith ritual altar came into the possession of Sith Lord Darth Sidious by the end of the Clone Wars.
A crystalline structure atop a sturdy base of a rock or metallic makeup, the ancient Sith ritual altar was of a pink and dark hue.

Found on Ziost, the Sith ritual altar was in the possession of Darth Sidious during the Clone Wars, who stored it in a desolate structure in The Works of the planet Coruscant before relocating it, along with the bulk of his personal collection, to the secret Sith retreat within the Grand Republic Medical Facility after the renegade clone trooper CT-5555's escape from the facility.
